PowerUp.Explain:
A 5% increase in damage per rank
(maximum +25%)

Shoot damage per rank is reduced by 1.
(maximum -3)

Maximum fitness increases by 10% per rank
(maximum +30%)

Physical recovery per second increases by 0.1 per rank
(up to 0.5)

The weapon cool time per rank is reduced by 2.5%
(up to 5%)

Attack range increased by 5% per rank
(maximum +10%)

Projectors are 10% faster per rank
(up to 20%)

The duration of the weapon's effectiveness per rank is increased by 15%
(maximum +30%)

Increase the range of item acquisition per rank by 25%
(maximum +50%)

A 10% increase in luck per rank
(maximum +30%)

Earns an additional 3% experience per rank
(up to 15%)

Enemy speed, fitness, population, spawn rate increase by 10% per rank
(maximum +50%)
